tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_profile (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_profile (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaign (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaign (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  campaign_type VARCHAR(20),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profile (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_profile(id),
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaign (
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    campaign_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    campaign_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    target_age_range VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    target_gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    target_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_results (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES marketing_campaign(campaign_id),
    conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    revenue_generated DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    campaign_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
